reviews.title: Awesome experience
reviews.text: We spent a whole weekend at this place and it was wonderful. It's pretty well kept; the staff is super friendly. Food is nothing to die for. Average puertorrican food. And I'm saying it on a positive way. What I mean is that it's tasteful but don't expect gourmet food. This is not a Ritz Carlton. It's a "parador"; a small inn. Simple but nice. Very quiet. Would like to go back soon. And in the evenings, don't miss the winery that is next door, BODEGAS ANDREU SOLE.

While the concept is different the place was neat, well located, rooms where big and clean. The pool was close by from my room and close to the restaurant and front desk couldn't complain. The food was great in the restaurant. There is like a small park at the other side of the hotel, great for kids to my daughter a few times. The beach close by from there playa santa was really great that time of year. The beds where really comfortable had a great night sleep. Would recomend it and stay again too.
reviews.title: Had a great week over there!

reviews.text: I stayed in the hotel from 8-16 to 08-18-2013 and was accommodated in room 109 that is next to the restaurant. I heard every noise made in the restaurant kitchen, including the music the staff was hearing. The electrical outlet in the bathroom did not work and I had trouble plugging the hair dryer in another outlet. I took a hair dryer (thank God) because the room had no dryer or iron like the website had announced it would. I requested the iron at front desk. The hotel has a gym but the little equipment it has, is in really bad condition (may I say there was only one 20 pound dumbell, that is careless of the hotel).
reviews.title: For an 8.4 rating, it was not what I expected.

reviews.text: From what I observed, this hotel focuses on certain amenities within the site like the main building and the pool area and should focus on the complete or whole facility. It needs renovation in certain areas. Take it from me being a real estate appraiser. I would not stay in this hotel again.
reviews.title: Great for the Family!

reviews.text: On May my husband and I went with our kids to this side of the island and it was a good choice. We booked at the Parador for a long weekend and between the pool, the breeze and the birds eating from my plate it was wonderful. Near by you have places to go, from renting a boat, a kayak or a swimming at Playa Santa beach. There are near by towns with attractions for all ages.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience!!
